article_title: 2 Reasons to Reject Obama’s 'Clean' Plan for Climate Change
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Congress should send a message to the U.N. climate summit in Paris: The Obama administration’s unilateral attempt to change our economy isn’t acceptable.
